body.p: allows you to configure custom processors to be used for running XSLT and XQuery transformations.

To add a new custom processor, follow these steps:
and go to XML XSLT-FO-XQuery Custom Engines .
Click the New button at the bottom of the dialog box.
Configure the parameters for the custom engine.
Click OK.

note.ph: You can not use these custom engines in the Debugger perspective.

body.p: The output messages of a custom processor are displayed in an output view at the bottom of the application window. If an output message follows the format of an linked message, clicking it highlights the location of the message in an editor panel containing the file referenced in the message.
